docRecallMaxNum.label: Max Recall Documents
docRecallMaxNum.tooltip: Maximum number of documents returned during retrieval. Larger values recall more comprehensively but slower.

simThreshold.label: Minimum Similarity
simThreshold.tooltip: Higher values mean stricter filtering, only returning documents with higher similarity (range: 0-1, recommended: 0.6-0.8).

searchEngineType.label: Search Engine Type
searchEngineType.tooltip: Select the engine type for document retrieval: Keyword search (fast)

searchEngineEnable.label: Enable Search Engine
searchEngineEnable.tooltip: Enable to use the search engine for document retrieval.
